column3:
雑多なクラフト用素材
自我が強く残る魔物に対して用いられる
支配力を強化した戦甲
column4:
Miscellaneous Crafting Material:
Used against strong-willed enemies.
War Ready armor strengthened with enhanced
dominance.

column3:
戦功をたてたドワーフオークであることを
たたえる魔軍の印
《鑑定交換》の取引対象になるようだ
column4:
The emblem of the Demon Army that honors a Dwarf
Orc who has achieved great war merit.
It seems to be a target for "Appraisal Exchange".

column3:
特定の期間のみ入手できる禍々しい力の塊
用途は無いが、欲しがる人物もいるようだ
column4:
A sinister mass of power that can only be
obtained during a specific period.
It seems that there are people who desire it,
even though it has no use.

column3:
草花系のクラフト用素材
水底に茂る目立たない色の水草
column4:
Floral Crafting Material: Inconspicuous colored
water grass that thrives at the bottom of water.

column3:
草花系のクラフト用素材
バラに似た美しい花を咲かせる
メガドシス高地固有の植物
column4:
Floral Crafting Material: A plant native to the
Megadosys Plateau that produces beautiful flowers
resembling roses.

column3:
雑多なクラフト用素材
倒木の中で育つ大きなイモムシ
column4:
Miscellaneous Crafting Material:
A large caterpillar that grows inside fallen trees

column3:
鉱石系のクラフト用素材
弾性があり、電気を通しにくい性質を持つ鉱石
column4:
Ore Crafting Material: A type of ore that
possesses elasticity and low conductivity of
electricity.

column3:
砂系のクラフト用素材
小さな玉状になった水はけのよい土
column4:
Sand Crafting Material:
A small, ball-shaped, well-draining soil.

column3:
キノコ系のクラフト用素材
かさの内側が鮮やかな赤色をしたキノコ
column4:
Mushroom Crafting Material.
Mushroom with a vibrant red color on the inside
of its cap.

column3:
肉系のクラフト用素材
アンセスターオークの発達した鼻を形作る軟骨
column4:
Meat Crafting Material: Cartilage that forms the

column3:
肉系のクラフト用素材
非常に強い酸を作るジオリザードマンの器官
column4:
Meat Crafting Material: Organ of the Geo Saurian,
which produces a highly potent acid.

column3:
雑多なクラフト用素材
何が書いてあったのかもわからない護符の切れ端
column4:
Miscellaneous Crafting Material: A fragment of a

column3:
皮革系のクラフト用素材
衝撃や高温に特に強いラージジオリザードの鱗
column4:
Pelt Crafting Material: Scales of the Giant Geo
Saurian, known for their exceptional resistance to

column3:

魔軍に使役され、火薬の臭いが染み付いた

column4:
Feather Crafting Material: Nightmare feathers
that have been enslaved by the Demon Army, with

column3:

ドワーフオークの数倍の大きさがある
アンセスターオークの牙
column4:
Fang Crafting Material:
Ancestor Orc fang, which is several times larger
than Dwarf Orc's.

column3:
皮革系のクラフト用素材
フォッデンの縞模様が入った分厚い表皮
column4:
Pelt Crafting Material: Thick hide with Fodden's

column3:
雑多なクラフト用素材
さらなる改良が施された新型の戦甲
column4:
Miscellaneous Crafting Material:
A new and improved version of war-ready armor.

column3:
雑多なクラフト用素材
衝撃を緩和する弾性に富んだ資材
column4:
Miscellaneous Crafting Material:
Resilient materials that provide cushioning

column3:
糸系のクラフト用素材
燃えにくい素材をさらに加工して作った紐

String Crafting Material: Materials made by

column3:
雑多なクラフト用素材
強い力に満ち、冷め固まることなく

Miscellaneous Crafting Material:
A magma that is filled with immense power, never

column3:
骨系のクラフト用素材
一定以上の大きさがあり
加工しやすい大型の骨
column4:
Bone Crafting Material:
Large bones that are of a certain size and easy

column3:
雑多なクラフト用素材

column3:

column4:

Occasionally, Cave Shrimp eggs are found in the

鉱物を粉にしたもの
column4:

column4:

高温の温泉水
column4:
Liquid Crafting Material: Obtained from various

springs water flows.

葉から根まで毒を含む草花

column4:

Grass and flowers that contain poison from leaves

Caution is necessary when touching.

column4: Wood Crafting Material: A part of petrified wood.

Sand Crafting Material: Volcanic ash imbued with

Mushroom Crafting Material.

column4:
Meat Crafting Material: Thick and elastic blood

咆えるような音を立てて燃え続ける炎
column4:
Miscellaneous Crafting Material:

Cloth Crafting Material: A cloth with a

Bricks that are widely used in Acre Selund.

particularly strong.

column3:

column4:
Floral Crafting Material: Ancient grains of

column3:

wheat, believed to have been brought in the past

Covered in tough scales, with wing membranes that

exchange.

レスタニアの花々の風味が心地よく
野生動物にも人にも大人気

Lestania honey, with a lingering sweetness has a

column3:
ポーンに与えることで
剛化の特技を習得させる果実
特技ランクが高い剛化を閃く確率も
大きく上昇する
column4:
By giving it to a Pawn, this fruit allows them to
learn the special skill of Harden.
It also greatly increases the chance of a
high-ranked Harden to flash into their mind.

column3:
ポーンに与えることで

大きく上昇する

By giving it to a Pawn, this fruit allows them to
learn the special skill of Heavy.
It also greatly increases the chance of a
high-ranked Heavy to flash into their mind.

column3:
失われた技術により作られた鋼鉄
地域によってさらに性質が異なるといわれている
column4:
Steel created by lost techniques.
It is said that its properties vary depending on
the region.

column3:

ポーンに与えることで
柔化の特技を習得させる果実
特技ランクが高い柔化を閃く確率も
大きく上昇する
column4:
By giving it to a Pawn, this fruit allows them to
learn the special skill of Weaken.
It also greatly increases the chance of a
high-ranked Weaken to flash into their mind.

column4: Coin with a finely detailed relief.

column3:
入手機会が限られたクラフト用素材
ねじれた王冠のようにも見える
炎そのものの色をした角
column4:
Crafting materials with limited availability:
A horn that looks like a twisted crown, colored
like the very essence of fire.

column3:
因果律に選ばれた者が持つ運命にあるもの
《鑑定交換》で利用できる他
特定装備の強化素材としても利用できる
column4:
Something inherent in the fate of those chosen by
causality.
Can be used in "Appraisal Exchange" and also as a
strengthening material for specific equipment.

column3:
入手機会が限られたクラフト用素材
利用された数多の罪人の魂が
己を解き放った者へ遺した魔力の塊
column4:
Crafting materials with limited availability.
A concentrated mass of magical power left by the
souls of numerous sinners who have been set free
and bestowed upon those who have unleashed
themselves.

column3: 細密なレリーフの刻まれたコイン
column4: Coin with a finely detailed relief.

column3: 細密なレリーフの刻まれたコイン
column4: Coin with a finely detailed relief.

column3:
黒呪の迷宮でのみ入手できるアイテム
頑丈な造りに強固な封印が施された箱
開けるには特殊な技術が必要
column4:
An item that can only be obtained in the
Bitterblack Maze.
A sturdy box with a strong seal.
Special techniques are required to open it.

column3:
入手機会が限られたクラフト用素材
深緑色に輝く宝石と王族の紋章が印象的なコイン
記念品として作られたもので貨幣としては使われない
column4:
Crafting materials with limited availability:
A coin with a striking deep green color and the
impressive coat of arms of the royal family.
It is made as a commemorative item and is not
used as currency.

column3:
おばけのようにフワフワと浮かんでいる布
マンドラゴラに着せると、可愛くも怖い
「おばけマンドラゴラ」に変身する
column4:
Cloth that floats like a ghost, fluffy and light.
When worn by a Mandragora, it transforms into the
cute yet eerie "Ghost Mandragora".

column3:
モスを連想させる見た目の発光する宝石
マンドラゴラに肥料として与えると、美しく光輝く
「ルミナスマンドラ･ランプ」に変身する
column4:
A gem that resembles a glowing moth, it
transforms into a beautiful and radiant "Luminous
Mandra Lamp" when used as fertilizer for the
Mandragora.

column3:
赤と白のまだら模様の苔が生えた珍しい宝石
マンドラゴラに肥料として与えると、王の威厳が溢れる
「おうさまマンドラゴラ」に変身する
column4:
A rare gem with a mottled pattern of red and
white moss growing on it.
When used as fertilizer for the Mandragora, it
transforms into the majestic "King Mandragora".

column3:
入手機会が限られたクラフト用素材

記念品として作られたもので貨幣としては使われない
column4:
Crafting materials with limited availability:
A coin with a striking deep green color and the
impressive coat of arms of the royal family.
It is made as a commemorative item and is not
used as currency.

column3:
宝石系のクラフト用素材
鋭く光り輝く黄色の宝石
column4:
Gem Crafting Material.
A beautiful gem that shines yellow.

を付加する
※【延焼】は攻撃時や、ステータス適用の
魔法属性と一致する場合、効果を発揮する
column4:
Adds status abnormalities [Caught Fire], [Fire
Resist Down], [Tarred].
*[Caught Fire] is effective when attacking or
when the status applies the attribute of fire.
